introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to ProManage. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and use our services, and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect and process the following types of personal information:
dataCollection.item2: Contact Data: email address, phone number (optional)
dataCollection.item3: Technical Data: IP address, browser type and version, time zone setting, operating system
dataCollection.item4: Usage Data: information about how you use our website and services
dataCollection.item5: Property Data: information about properties you manage, including addresses and utility bills

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
dataUse.item1: To provide and maintain our service
dataUse.item2: To notify you about changes to our service
dataUse.item4: To gather analysis or valuable information to improve our service
dataUse.item5: To detect, prevent and address technical issues
dataUse.item6: To process payments and manage subscriptions

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction or damage. Your data is stored on secure servers and we use encryption to protect sensitive information.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except to provide our services. This may include:

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to ensure the basic functionality of our website, such as maintaining your session and storing your preferences. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Under data protection laws, you have rights including:
userRights.item1: Right to access: You can request copies of your personal data
userRights.item2: Right to rectification: You can ask us to correct inaccurate information
userRights.item3: Right to erasure: You can ask us to delete your personal data
userRights.item4: Right to portability: You can request we transfer your data to another organization
userRights.item5: Right to object: You can object to certain types of processing

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us through the Contact Support option in the application.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using ProManage, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

description.title: Description of Service
description.content: ProManage is a property and rent management platform that allows landlords to manage properties, track utility bills, and communicate with renters. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the service at any time.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: When you create an account, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for:
accounts.item1: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
accounts.item2: All activities that occur under your account
accounts.item3: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to use the service to:
acceptableUse.item1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
acceptableUse.item2: Upload malicious software or harmful content
acceptableUse.item3: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
acceptableUse.item4: Interfere with or disrupt the service

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by ProManage and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Some features of ProManage require a paid subscription. By subscribing, you agree to pay the applicable fees. Subscription fees are billed in advance and are non-refundable except as required by law.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The service is provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall ProManage be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will provide notice of significant changes by posting the new terms on this page. Your continued use of the service after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws, without regard to conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the Contact Support option in the application.
